label: Description
value:
The field contains a verse, surrounded by an elaborate strawberry vine border which twists around a straight blue frame.
The verse reads: 
Virtue
Virtue, the strength and beauty of the soul,
Is the best gift of Heaven's happiness
That, even above the smiles and frowns of fate,
Exalts great nature's favorites a wealth
The ne'er encumbers, nor to base hands
Can be transferred. It is the only good
Man justly boasts of, or can call his own.
